input.html_content: <html><head><title>US11876543B2 - Wireless charging system with adaptive power delivery</title></head><body>...</body></html>

api_response.title: Wireless charging system with adaptive power delivery
api_response.abstract: A wireless power transfer system that dynamically adjusts charging parameters based on real-time monitoring of device characteristics and environmental conditions. The system employs machine learning algorithms to optimize power delivery efficiency across multiple devices simultaneously while preventing overheating and ensuring safety compliance. Novel coil design enables charging through metal surfaces and at extended distances.

output.title: Wireless charging system with adaptive power delivery

description: Electronics patent with 5 inventors - demonstrates handling of large inventor arrays and multiple classifications with priority date different from filing date
